column2: Captain America: Man Out of Time (2010) #3
column6: Lost and alone in a unfamiliar world, struggling to interact with a new generation of heroes, Steve Rogers seeks out someone--anyone--who might remember him from his former life. And even longtime Marvelites will be shocked at what he finds!
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | penciller (cover):Bryan Hitch | penciller:JORGE CARLOS MOLINA MANZANERO | writer:Mark Waid
